dc.title: Berkeley Lab Earth Sciences Division
dc.description: The Earth Sciences Division (ESD) at Berkeley Lab brings together geoscientists, mathematicians, microbiologists, computer scientists and engineers to address local, national and global problems related to energy resources, environmental remediation, nuclear waste disposal and global change. ESD blends fundamental and applied research to tackle some of the planet's most pressing issues, while building the knowledge base to address future concerns.
